body_html:
Well, I wished something like this feature because my laptop often freezed when I did something stupid in tensorflow.
Having an option to limit max mem usage in TF would be really cool, but currently I'm working with 32GB RAM and I obviously do not want to be limited to 3.2GB RAM usage :)

body:
Well, I wished something like this feature because my laptop often freezed when I did something stupid in tensorflow.
Having an option to limit max mem usage in TF would be really cool, but currently I'm working with 32GB RAM and I obviously do not want to be limited to 3.2GB RAM usage :)
